page.title: 04Morchard Bishop Sports Field
page.content: This field site of six acres was bought in 1959 for Â£200 from Sir Heathcoat-Amory.Now we have a clubhouse,sports complex,bowling green and children's play area.The sports complex caters for two football teams,two cricket teams,tennis and netball.The bowling green installed by the District Council last year has now enough members proficient to play local matches.The pavilion has now been modernised and enlarged for a clubhouse.A bar was also installed,the income from which helps to maintain the field.There are dart,ladies and mens skittles and two pool teams.A groundsman is employed to cut the grass,the green is maintained by volunteers and the clubhouse by a caretaker.A committee,registered with the Charity Commission,manages the field and club.
